claims.statement: A photo shows all the biggest tech bosses hanging out together over Thanksgiving dinner.
Elon Musk is in the photo.
Mark Zuckerberg is in the photo.
Sundar Pichai is in the photo.
Satya Nadella is in the photo.
Tim Cook is in the photo.
The individuals in the photo are sitting around a table.
The individuals in the photo are laughing.
The individuals in the photo are talking.
Drinks are on the table in the photo.
Someone is saying the photo was snapped right after a secret “super-AI summit”.
Someone is saying they met at this summit to decide the future of AI & Web.
These guys (Elon Musk, Mark Zuckerberg, Sundar Pichai, Satya Nadella, Tim Cook) usually fight behind closed doors.
